golden-triangle-tour.title: Golden Triangle of Odisha Tour
golden-triangle-tour.description: Explore the rich heritage, vibrant culture, and serene landscapes of Odisha through its Golden Triangle - Bhubaneswar, Konark, and Puri.
golden-triangle-tour.longDescription: Odisha (formerly Orissa), an eastern Indian state on the Bay of Bengal, is known for its tribal cultures and its many ancient Hindu temples. The ethnic culture of Odisha makes you visit all the places that are rich in culture, heritage and ethnicity. It also includes a trip to the dense woods which is the resident of many tribes living in Odisha. They consist of ethical gestures, art, handicrafts, mythologies and the ancient music which is amazing and full of life. Experience the medieval ages in the modern times and walk back into the world of vegetative and cultural Odisha. Odisha's Tribal Tour showcases famous tribes like Bondos, Didayis, Koyas, and Kondhs. Home to over 62 tribes, which constitute 29% of its population, Odisha offers a glimpse into unique tribal life, including their festivals, food, attire, music, and dance. Odisha is known as the homeland of simple down-to-earth tribes. The land of Odisha is rich in culture and tradition. The untouched beauty of tribal areas and their vibrant culture make Odisha Tribal Tours truly captivating.
includes: All transfers and sightseeing by Personalized AC Car
All Toll tax, parking fees & driver allowances
Private Boat: - For Chilika Lake Tour (If Chilika is present in the Itinerary)

itineraryDays.title: Arrival in Bhubaneswar – Explore the Temple City
activities: Arrival in Bhubaneswar and hotel transfer
Visit Mukteswar Temple, Rajarani Temple, and Parasurameswar Temple
Explore Khandagiri and Udayagiri Jain caves
Dinner and overnight stay in Bhubaneswar

itineraryDays.title: Bhubaneswar – Konark – Puri
activities: Stop at Ramchandi Temple and Chandrabhaga Beach
Proceed to Puri and visit Jagannath Temple

itineraryDays.title: Puri – Chilika Lake Excursion
activities: Breakfast and day trip to Chilika Lake
Motorboat ride to explore islands and spot dolphins and migratory birds

itineraryDays.title: Puri – Bhubaneswar – Departure
activities: Breakfast and visit Dhauli Shanti Stupa

jagannath-dham-darshan.title: Jagannath Dham Darshan
jagannath-dham-darshan.location: Bhubaneswar, Konark, Puri, Satapada, Odisha, India
jagannath-dham-darshan.description: A spiritually enriching journey through Odisha’s sacred cities—Bhubaneswar, Puri, Konark, and Satapada—featuring temples, beaches, heritage, and dolphins.
jagannath-dham-darshan.longDescription: Odisha (formerly Orissa), an eastern Indian state on the Bay of Bengal, is known for its tribal cultures and its many ancient Hindu temples. The ethnic culture of Odisha makes you visit all the places that are rich in culture, heritage and ethnicity. It also includes a trip to the dense woods which is the resident of many tribes living in Odisha. They consist of ethical gestures, art, handicrafts, mythologies and the ancient music which is amazing and full of life. Experience the medieval ages in the modern times and walk back into the world of vegetative and cultural Odisha. The Golden Triangle of Odisha—Bhubaneswar, Puri, and Konark—offers a captivating blend of ancient temples, coastal beauty, and vibrant culture. Perfect for travelers seeking spiritual solace, architectural grandeur, and scenic vistas, this iconic circuit is a treasure trove of experiences.

itineraryDays.title: Arrival at Bhubaneswar – The Temple City
activities: Arrival at Bhubaneswar Airport/Railway Station and hotel check-in with welcome drink and traditional aarti
Visit Lingaraj Temple, Mukteshwar Temple, and Parashurameshwara Temple
Visit the Odisha State Handicrafts Museum

itineraryDays.title: Bhubaneswar to Puri – A Journey of Nature and Craftsmanship
activities: Breakfast and visit to Nandankanan Biological Park (White Tiger Safari, reptiles, birds)
Arrival and check-in at hotel in Puri with welcome drink
Evening at leisure or beach stroll

itineraryDays.title: Puri – Spirituality and Tranquility
activities: Breakfast and visit to Shri Jagannath Temple
Dinner and overnight stay at hotel

itineraryDays.title: Excursion to Konark – The Sun Temple Marvel
activities: Breakfast and drive to Konark Sun Temple (UNESCO Site)
Return to Puri for dinner and overnight stay

itineraryDays.title: Satapada to Bhubaneswar – A Dolphin Adventure
activities: Breakfast and drive to Satapada (Chilika Lake)
Boat ride to spot Irrawaddy dolphins
Return to Bhubaneswar for airport/railway station drop-off

tribal-tour.title: Tribal Tour
tribal-tour.description: Immerse yourself in the vibrant cultures of Odisha's indigenous tribes in this unique ethnographic journey.
tribal-tour.longDescription: This immersive experience takes you deep into the tribal heartlands of Odisha to meet the Bondas, Dongria Kondhs, and other indigenous communities. Witness their ancient traditions, colorful handicrafts, and sustainable lifestyles. The tour includes village stays, cultural exchanges, and nature treks through the Eastern Ghats with expert anthropologist guides.
includes: 5 nights accommodation (mix of hotels and eco-lodges)

buddhism-and-beyond.title: Buddhism and Beyond
buddhism-and-beyond.description: Trace the Buddhist heritage of Odisha through its ancient monasteries and peace pagodas.
buddhism-and-beyond.longDescription: This spiritual journey covers Odisha's important Buddhist sites including the Diamond Triangle (Lalitgiri, Ratnagiri, and Udayagiri). Visit the Dhauli Peace Pagoda where Emperor Ashoka embraced Buddhism after the Kalinga War. The tour includes meditation sessions, monastery stays, and interactions with Buddhist monks while exploring Odisha's rich Buddhist archaeological heritage.

shakti-peeth.title: Shakti Peeth
shakti-peeth.description: A spiritual pilgrimage to Odisha's powerful Shakti Peethas - seats of the Divine Feminine.
shakti-peeth.longDescription: This sacred tour covers Odisha's most revered Shakti Peethas including Tara Tarini, Charchika, and Samaleswari temples. Experience the powerful feminine energy through special pujas, yagnas, and rituals conducted by temple priests. The journey includes stays near temples, traditional vegetarian meals, and opportunities to participate in ancient worship practices.

itineraryDays.title: Arrival & Tara Tarini Darshan
activities: Drive to Tara Tarini hill shrine

western-odisha-tour.title: Western Odisha Tour
western-odisha-tour.description: Discover the cultural richness of Western Odisha - from Sambalpuri textiles to tribal villages.
western-odisha-tour.longDescription: This immersive tour showcases Western Odisha's unique cultural heritage. Experience the world-famous Sambalpuri ikat weaving, visit tribal villages, explore the Hirakud Dam, and witness the region's distinctive folk arts. The package includes hands-on textile workshops, village homestays, and interactions with master artisans and tribal communities.
includes: 6 nights accommodation (mix of hotels and homestays)

wildlife-tourism.title: Wildlife Tourism
wildlife-tourism.description: A thrilling journey through Odisha's wilderness and heritage sites including Simlipal National Park, Kuldiha Sanctuary, and sacred temples.
wildlife-tourism.longDescription: Odisha (formerly Orissa), an eastern Indian state on the Bay of Bengal, is known for its tribal cultures and its many ancient Hindu temples. The ethnic culture of Odisha makes you visit all the places that are rich in culture, heritage and ethnicity. It also includes a trip to the dense woods which is the resident of many tribes living in Odisha. They consist of ethical gestures, art, handi-crafts, mythologies and the ancient music which is amazing and full of life. Experience the medieval ages in the modern times and walk back into the world of vegetative and cultural Odisha. Odisha's Tribal Tour showcases famous tribes like Bondos, Didayis, Koyas, and Kondhs. Home to over 62 tribes, which constituents 29% of its population. Odisha offers a glimpse into unique tribal life, including their festivals, food, attire, music, and dance. Odisha is known as the homeland of simple down to earth tribes. The land of Odisha is rich in culture and tradition. The untouched beauty of tribal areas and their vibrant culture make Odisha Tribal Tours truly captivating.

activities: Visit Rajarani Temple, Mukteswar Temple, Brahmeswar Temple, and Lingaraj Temple (outside view)

itineraryDays.title: Bhubaneswar – Balasore – Similipal Park
activities: Drive to Balasore and transfer to Ramtirtha Forest Lodge at Similipal National Park
Nature walk, herbal nursery, and crocodile breeding farm (time permitting)
Overnight stay at Ramtirtha Forest Lodge

itineraryDays.title: Similipal Park – Waterfalls and Jungle Safari
activities: Visit Barehipani Waterfall and Joranda Waterfall
Jungle safari in Similipal National Park
Dinner and overnight stay at Ramtirtha or Gurguria Forest Lodge

itineraryDays.title: Similipal – Panchlingeshwar – Kuldiha
activities: Drive to Panchlingeshwar and check in at Panthasala Lodge
Dinner and overnight stay at Panthasala Lodge

itineraryDays.title: Bhubaneswar – Nandankanan Zoological Park
activities: Visit Nandankanan Zoological Park (White Tiger Safari, Lion Safari, Botanical Garden)
Lunch at zoo and return to hotel
Dinner and overnight stay in Bhubaneswar

itineraryDays.title: Bhubaneswar – Spiritual Excursions and Departure
activities: Visit Nirmala Jhar Temple, Narayani Temple, and Banpur
Return to Bhubaneswar and transfer to airport/railway station

temple-tours.title: Temple Tours
temple-tours.description: A sacred journey through Odisha's most architecturally significant temples.
temple-tours.longDescription: This temple circuit covers Odisha's architectural marvels from the ancient Lingaraj Temple to the exquisite Mukteswar Temple. Experience the living temple traditions, learn about Kalinga architecture, and participate in special rituals. The tour includes guided explanations by temple scholars, comfortable stays, and authentic temple cuisine experiences.

kashmir-of-odisha.title: Kashmir of Odisha Tour
kashmir-of-odisha.location: Brahmapur, Daringbadi, Phulbani, Bhubaneswar, Odisha, India
kashmir-of-odisha.description: Explore the hidden treasures of Odisha—Brahmapur, Daringbadi, and Phulbani—through ancient temples, tribal culture, serene landscapes, and nature retreats.
kashmir-of-odisha.longDescription: Odisha (formerly Orissa), an eastern Indian state on the Bay of Bengal, is known for its tribal cultures and its many ancient Hindu temples. heritage-tour.location: Bhubaneswar, Konark, Puri, Gopalpur, Odisha, India

itineraryDays.title: Bhubaneswar – Excursion to the Diamond Triangle
activities: Breakfast and excursion to Ratnagiri (Buddhist relics, monasteries, stupas)
Visit Lalitgiri (oldest Buddhist site with Chaitya and relics)
Explore Udayagiri (largest Buddhist complex with sculptures)
Return to Bhubaneswar for dinner and overnight stay

itineraryDays.title: Bhubaneswar – Temple Tour and Nandankanan Zoo
activities: Visit Lingaraj Temple, Parsurameswar Temple, Mukteswar Temple, and Rajarani Temple
Post-lunch visit to Nandankanan Zoological Park (White Tiger Safari)
Dinner and overnight stay in Bhubaneswar

itineraryDays.title: Bhubaneswar – Dhauli – Pipili – Raghurajpur – Puri
activities: Arrival and check-in at hotel in Puri
Evening visit to Jagannath Temple or relax at Puri Beach

itineraryDays.title: Puri – Konark – Puri
activities: Drive to Konark and visit Sun Temple (UNESCO site)
Visit Ramchandi Temple and Chandrabhaga Beach
Return to Puri and explore beach market

itineraryDays.title: Puri – Chilika Lake – Gopalpur
activities: Boat cruise to Birds Island and Temple Island (Kalijai Temple)
Drive to Gopalpur and relax on the beach

itineraryDays.title: Gopalpur – Bhubaneswar
activities: Stop at Khandagiri and Udayagiri Jain Caves

itineraryDays.title: Departure from Bhubaneswar
activities: Optional sightseeing or shopping depending on departure schedule

eco-tourism.title: Eco-Tourism
eco-tourism.description: Sustainable travel through Odisha's pristine natural habitats and community conservation projects.
eco-tourism.longDescription: This eco-friendly tour focuses on responsible travel through Odisha's biodiversity hotspots. Stay in eco-lodges, participate in conservation activities, and experience community-based tourism initiatives. The itinerary includes Satkosia Gorge, Chilika Lake (Asia's largest brackish water lagoon), and mangrove ecosystems with expert naturalists.

textile-tourism.title: Textile Tourism
textile-tourism.description: A colorful journey through Odisha's textile traditions - from ikat to temple textiles.
textile-tourism.longDescription: This textile-focused tour takes you to the heart of Odisha's weaving villages. Witness the intricate processes behind Sambalpuri ikat, Bomkai, and other traditional textiles. Meet master weavers, try your hand at natural dyeing, and build your own textile collection with expert guidance. The tour includes visits to off-loom weaving centers and rare textile collections.

adventure-tour-plan.title: Adventure Tour Plan
adventure-tour-plan.description: Thrilling adventures across Odisha's diverse landscapes - from disappearing beaches to mighty waterfalls.
adventure-tour-plan.longDescription: Odisha (formerly Orissa), an eastern Indian state on the Bay of Bengal, is known for its tribal cultures and its many ancient Hindu temples. The ethnic culture of Odisha (Orissa) makes you visit all the places that are rich in culture, heritage and ethnicity. It also includes a trip to the dense woods which is the resident of many tribes living in Odisha (Orissa). They consist of ethical gestures, art, handi-crafts, mythologies and the ancient music which is amazing and full of life. Experience the medieval ages in the modern times and walk back into the world of vegetative and cultural Odisha. Odisha's Tribal Tour showcases famous tribes like Bondos, Didayis, Koyas, and Kondhs. activities: Explore villages of Gotalpara and Dural

itineraryDays.title: Adventure at Deomali Peak
activities: Enjoy valley views and return to hotel

itineraryDays.title: Spiritual Journey to Gupteswar

itineraryDays.title: Majestic Chitrakoot Waterfalls
